positive_examples: This is an example of thumbsup.
We observed thumbsup in this context.
A typical case of thumbsup would involve these features.
The concept of thumbsup applies here.
A hand gesture where the thumb is extended upward to express approval, agreement, or encouragement.
negative_examples: This is an example of waving, not thumbsup.
This represents hand gesture in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Waving, or other types of HandGesture

definition: A hand gesture with extended thumb indicating approval or agreement.
